entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a character who gestures to Harry to retreat. He is described as having a wand that flies in an arc over the edge of the ramparts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character who is being gestured to retreat by Dumbledore. He is described as drawing his wand and having his body become rigid and immobile after the Expelliarmus spell is cast.

entities.name: tower wall
entities.description: The Tower Wall is introduced as a location where Harry falls back against it, becoming propped like an unsteady statue.

relationships.description: Dumbledore wordlessly immobilizes Harry with the Expelliarmus spell, which is not a Freezing Charm.
